entry.title: The Great Jerma House Flipper Edit Collaboration (Part 2)

media:group.media:description:
Jerma's Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/jerma985 2ndJerma: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCL7DDQWP6x7wy0O6L5ZIgxg Jerma streams House Flipper long edit playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLtDqnj8obubbb2qjCuUxAtQ8EaoNQd_27
0:00 Stream #6 (8/19/2020): https://youtu.be/vS7ZoPJb_eY Edited by Cheltie (https://www.youtube.com/c/Cheltie) Cheltie's Tip Jar: https://ko-fi.com/cheltie Transition Music: watson - wood note https://youtu.be/ZYM4GkcWSOY Editor's Commentary: N/A
1:10:41 Stream #7 (8/20/2020): https://youtu.be/l9s6alzTthM Edited by Porkako (https://www.youtube.com/user/ebay765) Porkako's Tip Jar: https://ko-fi.com/porkako Transition Music: watson - orange https://youtu.be/1KTMNTwhu2Q Editor's Commentary: Venom Bernie got snubbed out of the rumble
3:19:11 Stream #8 (11/25/2020): https://youtu.be/BQaSlD_UFRU Edited by FerretNoir (https://www.youtube.com/c/FerretNoir) FerretNoir's Tip Jar: https://ko-fi.com/ferretnoir Transition Music: watson - R.E.C.Y.C.L.E https://youtu.be/UcHjzz-0d0Q Editor's Commentary: This is one of my favorite streams so editing it was fun
4:53:12 Stream #9 (12/22/2021): https://youtu.be/TF2enQTTSxw / https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1240892387 Edited by Golden_Winged (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOu47CE1nZUoBOxqlDpa66A) Transition Music: watson - 内包する大地 https://youtu.be/23z1funXCB8 Editor's Commentary: N/A
6:31:31 Bro vs Bro (3/31/2022): https://youtu.be/t9HBRf_qWZg?t=7217 Edited by FerretNoir (https://www.youtube.com/c/FerretNoir) FerretNoir's Tip Jar: https://ko-fi.com/ferretnoir Transition Music: watson - 草原の民 https://youtu.be/8fdEPxWsNdg Recap Music: Half-Life: Opposing Force - Bust https://youtu.be/PjeCDbcYQt0 Editor's Commentary: Jerma streamed this in terrible quality so sadly this section is notably worse
7:00:39 Stream #10 (5/25/2022): https://youtu.be/KeUbYPTy4pc / https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1309073649 Edited by Skye4 (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmoocNPdc3EYwgmFyB3KHzg) Transition Music: watson - 砂のコラージュ https://youtu.be/_nNDl7Ec4SU Editor's Commentary: See you all next time when he streams the Barn Flipper DLC.

entry.title: The Great Jerma House Flipper Edit Collaboration (Part 1)

media:group.media:title: The Great Jerma House Flipper Edit Collaboration (Part 1)
media:group.media:description:
Jerma's Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/jerma985 2ndJerma: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCL7DDQWP6x7wy0O6L5ZIgxg Jerma streams House Flipper long edit playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLtDqnj8obubbb2qjCuUxAtQ8EaoNQd_27
0:00 Intro
0:14 Stream #1 (5/19/2018): https://youtu.be/FM6uHetKE8s Edited by Skye4 (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmoocNPdc3EYwgmFyB3KHzg) Transition Music: watson - 潮騒アーベント https://youtu.be/y6Z0p6C7Prk Editor's Commentary: So, I originally didn't intend for this to be a collaborative video. I wanted to make a huge edit of every House Flipper stream Jerma's done, and I started working on editing the first House Flipper stream around October or November of 2021. However, I kept losing interest or wanting to work on other projects, so I didn't have it finished until December 8, 2021. I finished editing about half of the second stream before I got distracted by other projects again, until February 24, 2022, when I talked to some other independent Jerma editors and suggested collaborating on editing all of Jerma's House Flipper streams, because at the rate I was working, I was never going to finish. They liked the idea, so we chose which streams we were interested in editing. I had already finished working on stream #1 and was halfway through stream #2, and I decided to also edit stream #5. I promise you'll see a lot less of me in the second part.
3:05:27 Stream #2 (7/18/2018): https://youtu.be/X5zOQL1eDAw (Prototype for 8 minutes) / https://youtu.be/X5zOQL1eDAw (House Flipper) Edited by Skye4 Transition Music: watson - 砂に埋もれたラジオ https://youtu.be/91_IqsSnPAM Editor's Commentary: I decided to include the Prototype segment because why not.
5:17:19 Stream #3 (7/24/2018): https://youtu.be/gEdjzKOeLao Edited by Pythanoc (https://www.youtube.com/c/Pythanoc) Pythanoc's Tip Jar: https://ko-fi.com/pythanoc Transition Music: watson - 電脳漂流記 https://youtu.be/sqG_a1-c8f4 Editor's Commentary: This guy is a psychopath
7:10:47 Stream #4 (5/23/2019): https://youtu.be/C5WE8-464vk Edited by Josho (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCG8N12GFx55u-PUfaiC9MRw) Josho's Tip Jar: https://ko-fi.com/joshoeditsjerma Transition Music: watson - ヴァニラ https://youtu.be/-sE-5_Fs3bE Editor's Commentary: old man yells at cloud
8:07:50 Stream #5 (5/24/2019): https://youtu.be/E6vQYnvknjU Edited by Skye4 Transition Music: watson - Sweet vermouth https://youtu.be/zqYxPCXLH9o Editor's Commentary: I'm running out of interesting things to say.

entry.title: The MeStrong Wrestling Arc - Jerma Streams Wrestling Empire (Long Edit #3)

media:group.media:title: The MeStrong Wrestling Arc - Jerma Streams Wrestling Empire (Long Edit #3)
media:group.media:description:
From Jerma's third Wrestling Empire stream (4/13/2022): https://youtu.be/89BNlJlGh8k / https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1455196549 Jerma's Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/jerma985 2ndJerma: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCL7DDQWP6x7wy0O6L5ZIgxg Jerma streams Wrestling Empire long edit playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLtDqnj8obubZKa2pS9E_uEOPJd8MSX293

Outro Compilation Music: watson - 小さな街の小さなカーニバル https://musmus.main.jp/chiptune.html
Timestamps 0:00 Stream Starts 3:02 The Don Dweeb Wrestling Arc Begins 15:58 Match #0.5: Furniture Smash — Baby Bull vs Big Bob Orson 19:50 Match #1: Singles vs Midwinter 33:48 Match #2: Singles vs Boston Blufly 43:55 Match #3: Snooker Tables & Table Legs — Singles vs Berlaine 51:25 Match #3.5: Singles — Endon Sezzer vs Infinite Best (as a referee) 54:34 Match #4: 3-Way vs Multiple Opponents 59:25 Match #5: Singles vs Sebastian Slobber 1:08:06 Match #5.5: Singles — Win Stevenson (with Jerma) vs Victoria Hinks 1:15:37 The MeStrip Wrestling Arc Begins 1:18:46 Match #1: Singles vs Wide Tide 1:24:15 Match #2: Singles vs David Hybrow 1:34:00 Match #3: Hardcore — Singles vs David Hybrow 1:39:44 Match #4: 8-Man Tag Team vs High Note's Team 1:43:23 Match #5: Confrontation vs Beckie Lane 1:45:55 Match #6: Tag Team Championship — Tag Team vs Battering Ron's Team 1:52:01 Match #7: No Ring — Tag Elimination vs Jester's Team 2:00:02 Match #8: Tag Team Championship — Tag Team vs Bill Dozer's Team 2:10:09 Match #9: Tag Team — Submission vs High Note's Team 2:20:34 Match #10: 8-Man War vs High Note's Team 2:24:18 Match #11: Confrontation vs Jester 2:30:47 Match #12: Confrontation vs Errol Hathaway 2:36:30 Match #13: Tag Team Championship — Team vs Kongo's Team 2:41:20 Match #14: Steel Cage — Tag Team vs Kongo's Team 2:48:03 The Funny
Note: I had to remove the intro due to a copyright issue.
